attributes.action: Thousands of current pensioners will be 2nd Rate pensioners in 2017.
attributes.additional_details:
Having previously stated this change will start in 2015 there should be no reason why those 4 million now due to miss out cannot be tapered into the new system just as women have been levered into a higher pension age.
If you now officially retire in March 2017 or earlier you will get £107 a week but if you retire after March 2017 you will get £144 a week - £37 a week difference, this is totally unfair for women who now have to work longer missing out over 3 to 4 years of £17,000+ of missing pension now those women are being targetted again by losing £37 a week.  This is not just about women but all members of our society of pensionable age now.  Please sign this petition and maybe/hopefully will get back to the ministers to do something about this unjust
